metadata.title: USN-6542-1 -- TinyXML vulnerability
metadata.description: Wang Zhong discovered that TinyXML incorrectly handled certain inputs. If a user or an automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted input file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a  denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6542-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libtinyxml-doc - 2.6.2-4ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1 libtinyxml-dev - 2.6.2-4ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1 libtinyxml2.6.2v5 - 2.6.2-4ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
